title: Register Your Interest - Team Member
content:
OVERVIEW:As a brand, our mission is to unite the conditioning community, and for the first time ever, we are doing this in a permanent retail space. As the most important role in the store team, you‚Äôll play a pivotal part in bringing Gymshark to life, in real life. Our store will behave in a way that‚Äôs totally unique to Gymshark. Our community and customers are our ‚Äòfamily‚Äô, so we treat them as such. We don‚Äôt care if they buy, browse, or just hang out. What matters is providing a safe space where everyone belongs and feels welcome.
WORKING HOURS: Full Time & Part Time
WHAT YOU‚ÄôLL BE DOING:

Providing an incredible community experience, by being a Gymshark ambassador.
Contributing to your store‚Äôs community, values, and shared goals.
Ensuring our community have an unforgettable shopping experience.
Seamlessly move between all areas of the store whilst delivering a consistent experience.
Demonstrating Gymshark products, working with customers to identify their needs and match with the right products.
Proactively approaching customers, supporting queries and sharing product knowledge.
Supporting with processing deliveries, audits and promotions.
Ensuring the store looks and feels ready to invite the world in.
Always ready to engage customers to bring them into the Gymshark community and share the brand story.
Support events in store, helping to inform and excite the community.
Actively meet new and current members of the Gymshark community, updating them on the exciting events coming to store, creating a fun, inclusive and diverse community.
Collaborating with the team to ensure training is both followed and completed.

WHAT YOU‚ÄôLL NEED:

A passion for community, wellness, or fitness.
Enjoy talking to people and be at ease approaching customers and talking about our products.
A passion for delivering awesome customer experience.
A passion for retail environments and teamwork.
Enthusiasm and driven.
Clear communication skills.
A natural networker and connector.
You are comfortable with digital technology.
You can commit to working flexibly. This could be in-store, on weekends or bank holidays.
To meet the relevant right to work requirements in the UK in place at the time of applying.

BELONGING AT GYMSHARK
Our mission is to be a place where everyone belongs. We‚Äôre an equal opportunities employer, and for us that means we always strive to be as inclusive as possible in all aspects of employment, right from your application. We‚Äôre committed to finding reasonable adjustments* for candidates with specific needs or have a disability during our recruitment process, and all applicants will be considered fairly and equally. We do not tolerate discrimination of any kind. *If you‚Äôd like to request a reasonable adjustment please email retailtalent@gymshark.com.
OUR VALUES ARE INVALUABLE
Sharing the same values and beliefs make us who we are ‚Äì visionaries. You will be the type of person that always looks to be accessible, inclusive, and humble (Be Human). You are conscious of the world we live in, caring for those around us and are proactive to create positive change (Give a Shit). You are honest, trustworthy, and genuine (Do the Right Thing). You are ambitious, agile and have a disruptive approach (Find the Gymshark Way). You understand that to go further, we go together (Put Family First)

questions.label: Do you have any retail experience?
Have you got experience working in a customer facing role? Such as a charity shop, library, retail store, caf√©/restaurant/bar, front of house/receptionist, call centres.
What is your current notice period?
Are you interested in the 14,21 or 35 hour contract?
Please confirm you have full weekend availability
Can you please tell us what your expected hourly rate would be?

questions.description: Legally, we have to verify your Right to Work in the UK before you can start work with us. We're asking for this information now so we know what type of right to work check we need to do later on in the process. Your answer to this question won't affect the outcome of your application, unless you need visa sponsorship and are applying for a role that we can't sponsor.
questions.label: Please confirm your UK Right to Work status.

values.label: I'm a UK or Irish National.
I'm an EU, EEA, or Swiss National with status under the EU Settlement Scheme.
I've got another type of visa, which gives me permanent right to work in the UK.
I've got another type of visa, which gives me temporary right to work in the UK.
I have visa sponsorship from another company, which gives me the right to work in the UK but, would need visa sponsorship to work for Gymshark.
I don't have the right to work in the UK and would need visa sponsorship to work for Gymshark.

questions.description:
‚úÖ Disability Confident Committed 

We’re proud to be a Disability Confident Committed employer and want to encourage anyone with a disability to apply for a role at Gymshark. We offer an interview to candidates with disabilities or long-term conditions who meet the minimum criteria for the role. 

Please let us know below if would you like to apply through the Disability Confident scheme.

values.label: Yes, I want to apply through the Disability Confident scheme

questions.description:
üôå Reasonable Adjustments

We’re committed to finding reasonable adjustments for candidates with specific needs or have a disability during our recruitment process, and all applicants will be considered fairly and equally. We do not tolerate discrimination of any kind. 

If you’d like to request a reasonable adjustment please email talent@gymshark.com.

üîèPrivacy Statement 

We understand that keeping your data safe is really important - it's important to us too!

When you apply for a role with us your personal data in your application will be collected by Gymshark Ltd. and/or Gymshark US Inc. (collectively, “Gymshark”).

This data will be processed subject to our Job Applicant Privacy Notice. 

Please confirm your acknowledgment of this.
